Supergirl TV Talk 2×12: “Luthors”

14 Feb 2017
Podcasts Supergirl TV Talk

This week on Supergirl TV Talk, Frank and Tim talk Luthors, synthetic Kryptonite, amazing VFX, and so much more. Plus the listener mailbag and a celebration of crossing 100 iTunes reviews!
